title: Bitter Dream ( 2004) Trailers, Interviews, Featurettes, Behin

sources.title: Bitter Dream ( 2004) Trailers, Interviews, Featurettes, Behin
sources.description: On the outskirts of Sedeh, Iran, corpse washer Esfandiar rules over the local cemetery with an iron fist, lording his power over his goofy apprentice and the perpetually stoned gravedigger. When he begins to see intimations of his own mortality broadcast on his TV, Esfandiar tries to ask for his co-workers' forgiveness so he can have a proper burial. Translate: AKA: Khab-e Talkh Genre: Comedy , Drama , Foreign Actors: Yadollah Anvari , Abbas Esfandiari , Delbar Ghasri , Mohsen Rahimi , Safar-ali Safari Director: Mohsen Amiryoussefi Producers: Mohsen Amiryoussefi , Rouhollah Baradari Writers: Mohsen Amiryoussefi
